attributes.action: UK nationals should get the same amount of benefit in EU states as they do in UK
attributes.background: The EU should be the same for all member states.  We should have a reciprocal agreement.  If EU nationals can get benefit in the UK without paying into the system.  UK residents want the same rights in other EU states

rejection.details: We're not sure what your petition is asking for. British citizens are already entitled to claim benefits in other EU states.
